rukus.text: And We have certainly sent Noah to his people (saying): I am a clear warner for you
that you should not serve except God, indeed I am afraid of the punishment of a painful day for you

And the leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: we see you are only a human being like us, and we only see those simple minded low lives among us followed you, and we do not see you have any advantage over us, rather we think of you as liars
He said: my people, what do you think, if I am on a clear proof from my Master and He gave me mercy from Himself that is made obscure to you, should we force it on you while you dislike it
My people, I do not ask you for any wealth for it, my wage is only God's responsibility, and I do not drive away those who believed. Indeed they meet their Master, but I see you as ignorant people
And my people, who helps me against God if I drive them away, do you not take notice

I do not say to you that treasures of God are with me, and I do not know the unseen, and I do not say that I am an angel, and I do not say about those who are despicable in your eyes that God never gives them any good, as God knows best what is in their souls, in that case I am indeed of the wrongdoers (if I drive them away)
They said: Noah, you have argued with us, and argued too much with us, so bring us what you promise us if you are truthful
He said: only God brings it to you if He wants and you cannot escape (or stop) it
And if I want to advise you, my advice does not benefit you if God wants to mislead you. He is your Master, and you are returned to Him
Or do they say he made it up? Say: if I made that up, then my crime is on me, and I am free of your crime
